<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// pass.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// If there are no errors, the function returns false. If an error is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// found, a message describing the error is written to OS (if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// non-null) and true is returned.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\return true if the module is broken. If BrokenDebugInfo is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// supplied, DebugInfo verification failures won&#39;t be considered as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// error and instead &#42;BrokenDebugInfo will be set to true. Debug</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// info errors can be &quot;recovered&quot; from by stripping the debug info.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Create a verifier pass.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Check a module or function for validity. This is essentially a pass wrapped</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// around the above verifyFunction and verifyModule routines and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// functionality. When the pass detects a verification error it is always</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// printed to stderr, and by default they are fatal. You can override that by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// passing \\c false to \\p FatalErrors.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Note that this creates a pass suitable for the legacy pass manager. It has</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// nothing to do with \\c VerifierPass.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/verifierpass"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/verifierpass/#afdfa087b5d970e456095d7c0bad144fa">VerifierPass</a> : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/passinfomixin">PassInfoMixin</a>&lt;VerifierPass&gt; &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FatalErrors;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/verifierpass/#afdfa087b5d970e456095d7c0bad144fa"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">explicit</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/verifierpass/#afdfa087b5d970e456095d7c0bad144fa">VerifierPass</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FatalErrors = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) : FatalErrors(FatalErrors) &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
